title: Beacon's Call 1
author: Adventurer H. C.
pages: The thrill of adventure calls once more. I've embarked on a mission to harness a beacon, a centerpiece of radiant power.
For this grand undertaking, I'll need to erect a mighty pyramid as the foundation. It requires steady hands and plenty of material.
Gathering iron, gold, or emeralds should set my base alight. I reckon an expedition to the depths will soon be underway.
By day, I'll dig the earth, mining these metals. By night, I'll rest, for what awaits is a true test of endurance.
